short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The quicksand extension allows you to edit copy on your landing page using GPT-3.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The quicksand extension allows you to edit copy on your landing page using GPT-3. The extension is used in conjunction with the web app https://quicksand.ai
